Title: Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year
Writer: Jaideep Sahni (dialogue), Jaideep Sahni (screenplay), Jaideep Sahni (story)
Actors: Ranbir Kapoor, Prem Chopra, Mukesh Bhatt, D. Santosh
Plot: A story of a fresh graduate trying to find a balance between the maddening demands of the 'professional' way, and the way of his heart.
